languages.text: "Маражай Эзирраеш, дракон кабала Опустошительной бури, Первый клинок Иремерисс, Потрошитель Иллиридоса, Сжигатель Баркагского царства и убийца Карроция Бледного," {n}— властный нечеловеческий голос вырывает вас из тисков агонии, и вы замечаете фигуру друкари, от одного присутствия которой сжимается нутро, —{/n} "как ты посмел предстать перед советом архонтов Темного города с этим... низшим существом?"

traits.locale_text: "Маражай Эзирраеш, Дракон кабала Опустошительной Бури, Первый клинок Иремерисс, Потрошитель Иллиридоса, Сжигатель Баркагского царства и убийца Карроция Бледного," {n}- властный нечеловеческий голос вырывает вас из тисков агонии, и вы замечаете фигуру друкари, от одного присутствия которой сжимается нутро, -{/n} "как ты посмел предстать перед советом архонтов Темного города с этим... низшим существом?"

languages.text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First Blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "...how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"
languages.original_text: "Маражай Эзирраеш, дракон кабала Опустошительной бури, Первый клинок Иремерисс, Потрошитель Иллиридоса, Сжигатель Баркагского царства и убийца Карроция Бледного," {n}— властный нечеловеческий голос вырывает вас из тисков агонии, и вы замечаете фигуру друкари, от одного присутствия которой сжимается нутро, —{/n} "как ты посмел предстать перед советом архонтов Темного города с этим... низшим существом?"

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale," {n}— the commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari who very presence makes your innards clench, —{/n} "How dare you present the council of archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

"Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale," {n}— the commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari who very presence makes your innards clench, —{/n} "How dare you present the council of archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "... how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

"Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First Blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "... how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

"Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First Blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "... how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

languages.text: “玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，狂风阴谋团的裁决官，伊芮梅莉斯女士的首席利刃，伊利多斯的开膛剑，嚎巫王国的怒焰，苍白者卡洛西斯的屠刀……”{n}这位异形的声音充满了命令的意味，让你从痛苦之中清醒了过来。你看到了一名黑暗灵族的身影，仅仅是他的存在，便仿佛让你的内脏挤在了一起。{/n}“……你竟敢带着这只……劣等生物，来到黑暗之城执政官的议会之中？”
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First Blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "...how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

traits.locale_text: “玛拉斋·艾泽拉什，狂风阴谋团的裁决官，伊芮梅莉斯夫人的首席利刃，伊利多斯的开膛剑，嚎巫王国的怒焰，苍白者卡洛西斯的屠刀……”{n}这位异形的声音充满了命令的意味，让你从痛苦之中清醒了过来。你看到了一名黑暗灵族的身影，仅仅是他的存在，便仿佛让你的内脏挤在了一起。{/n}“……你竟敢带着这只……劣等生物，来到黑暗之城执政官的议会之中？”

languages.text: 「マラズハイ・アエジレシュ。陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉のドラコン。レディ・イレメリスに命を捧げる忠実な剣。イリリドスのエヴィサレイター、バルカグ王国の炎、青白きカロシウスの殺し屋…」{n}人間のものではない威厳ある声が苦悶の中から意識を引き離し、見るだけで身体の内からよじれるほどの不快感を覚える人影が現れた。{/n}「…なぜこのような下等な生物を、仄暗き都のアーコン評議会に連れてきた？」
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First Blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "...how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイ・アエジレシュ。陰謀団〈略奪の嵐〉のドラコン。レディ・イレメリスに命を捧げる忠実な剣。イリリドスのエヴィサレイター、バルカグ王国の炎、青白きカロシウスの殺し屋…」{n}人間のものではない威厳ある声が苦悶の中から意識を引き離し、見るだけで身体の内からよじれるほどの不快感を覚える人影が現れた。{/n}「…なぜこのような下等な生物を、仄暗き都のアーコン評議会に連れてきた？」

languages.text: «Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracón de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora. Primera espada de lady Yremeryss. Destripador de Illiridos, Llama del Reino de Barkhag y Aniquilador de Carrocius el Pálido...». {n}La voz imponente e inhumana te libera de las garras de la agonía, y ves la silueta de un Drukhari cuya presencia basta para tensar todo tu cuerpo.{/n} «... ¿Cómo osas presentarte ante el Consejo de Arcontes de la Ciudad Siniestra junto con esta... criatura inferior?».
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First Blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "...how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

traits.locale_text: «Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracón de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora. Primera espada de lady Yremeryss. Destripador de Illiridos, Llama del Reino de Barkhag y Aniquilador de Carrocius el Pálido...». {n}La voz imponente e inhumana te libera de las garras de la agonía, y ves la silueta de un Drukhari cuya presencia basta para tensar todo tu cuerpo.{/n} «... ¿Cómo osas presentarte ante el Consejo de Arcontes de la Ciudad Siniestra junto con esta... criatura inferior?».

languages.text: « Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, première lame de dame Yremeryss, Éventreur d'Illiridos, Brasier du royaume de Barkhag, Tueur de Carrocius le Blafard... » {n}La voix non-humaine et autoritaire vous tire de votre souffrance et vous voyez la silhouette d'un Drukhari dont la simple présence vous retourne les entrailles.{/n} « Comment osez-vous vous présenter devant le Conseil des archontes de la Cité Crépusculaire avec cette... créature inférieure ? »
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First Blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "...how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

traits.locale_text: « Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse, première lame de dame Yremeryss, Éventreur d'Illiridos, Brasier du royaume de Barkhag, Tueur de Carrocius le Blafard... » {n}La voix inhumaine et autoritaire vous tire de votre souffrance et vous voyez la silhouette d'un Drukhari dont la simple présence vous retourne les entrailles.{/n} « Comment osez-vous vous présenter devant le Conseil des archontes de la Cité Crépusculaire avec cette... créature inférieure ? »

languages.text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon der Kabale des plündernden Sturms. Erste Klinge von Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator von Illiridos, Lohe des Barkhag-Königreichs und Sieger über Carrocius den Blassen ..." {n}Die gebieterische Stimme reißt dich aus der Agonie, und du siehst die Silhouette des Drukhari, bei dessen bloßer Anwesenheit sich deine Eingeweide verkrampfen.{/n} "... wie könnt Ihr es wagen, vor den Rat der Archonten der Dunklen Stadt zu treten mit dieser ... niederen Kreatur?"
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First Blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "...how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon der Kabale des plündernden Sturms. Erste Klinge von Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator von Illiridos, Lohe des Barkhag-Königreichs und Sieger über Carrocius den Blassen ..." {n}Die gebieterische Stimme reißt dich aus der Agonie, und du siehst die Silhouette des Drukhari, bei dessen bloßer Anwesenheit sich deine Eingeweide verkrampfen.{/n} "... wie könnt Ihr es wagen, vor den Rat der Archonten der Dunklen Stadt zu treten mit dieser ... niederen Kreatur?"

languages.text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı Drakonu. Leydi Yremeryss'in yaveri. İlliridos'un Karındeşeni." {n}İnsan dışı varlıktan gelen buyurgan ses, seni içinde bulunduğun ızdırap kıskacından koparıyor. Karşındaki Drukhari'nin silüeti bile iç organlarının birbirinin içine geçmesine neden oluyor.{/n} "Kara Şehir'deki Arkonlar konseyinin karşısına bu aşağılık yaratıkla gelmeye nasıl cüret edersin?"
languages.original_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Dracon of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest. First Blade to Lady Yremeryss. Eviscerator of Illiridos, Blaze of the Barkhag Kingdom, and Slayer of Carrocius the Pale..." {n}The commanding inhuman voice tears you from the vice of agony, and you see the silhouette of a Drukhari whose very presence makes your innards clench.{/n} "...how dare you come before the council of Archons of the Dark City with this... lesser creature?"

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai Aezyrraesh. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'nın Drakon'u. Leydi Yremeryss'in yaveri. İlliridos'un Karındeşeni." {n}İnsan dışı bir varlıktan gelen buyurgan ses, seni içinde bulunduğun ızdırap kıskacından koparıyor. Karşındaki Drukhari'nin silüeti bile iç organlarının birbirinin içine geçmesine neden oluyor.{/n} "Kara Şehir'deki Arkonlar konseyinin karşısına bu aşağılık yaratıkla gelmeye nasıl cüret edersin?"
